cat_item.display_value: Copy of Request\Revoke GAF\Other Share Access

catalog_script_client.name: Validate the share type

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_6fa5eaffdb783458effc345239961998
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Request\Revoke GAF\Other Share Access">cba5eebfdb783458effc34523996193c</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:1ba5eaffdb783458effc34523996191f</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Validate the share type</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

	var sharetype = (g_form.getValue('type_of_share'));
	var path   = (g_form.getValue('please_select_the_share_path'));
	
	var host = g_form.getReference('please_select_the_share_path', function setIP(host) {
	var paths =  host.path;
	//alert (paths);
	if( sharetype == "GAF Share"){
		if (!paths.substring(0,5)== '\\wbi')
			{
				alert ('Share Type is "GAF Share" but the share path is "Traditional Share". So please change the share type/path');
				//confirm('Selected Share path is not belongs to "Traditional Share". Please update share type.');
				g_form.clearValue('please_select_the_share_path');
			}
		}
	else if(sharetype == 'Traditional Share')
			{
				
				if (paths.substring(2,9)== 'wbi.nxp')
				{
					//alert ('Share Type is "Traditional Share" but the share path is "GAF Share". So please change the share type/path');
					confirm('Selected Share path is not belongs to "Traditional Share". Please update share type.');
					g_form.clearValue('please_select_the_share_path');
				}
			}
        //confirm(sharetype);
        return false;
		});
    }
		
   
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nxf52093</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-24 10:00:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6fa5eaffdb783458effc345239961998</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate the share type</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NXP GAF Share Automation" source="x_nxps3_nxp_gaf_sh">4a417d661b85005017daa6886e4bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NXP GAF Share Automation">4a417d661b85005017daa6886e4bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6fa5eaffdb783458effc345239961998</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nxf52093</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-24 10:00:05</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
